title: John Stamos takes to Instagram to share selfie with 17-month-old son Billy who flashes toothy smile
text:
John Stamos took to Instagram on Tuesday to share a selfie of himself with smiling son Billy.

The 56-year-old actor was shirtless with a white towel wrapped around his waist in the picture he shared on Instagram Stories for his roughly 3.2 million followers.

John had his dark hair slicked back while taking the selfie with his cell phone.

Son selfie: John Stamos shared a selfie with his 17-month-old son Billy on Tuesday on Instagram

He held his 17-month-old son Billy who showed a toothy grin as his father took the picture.

John and actress Caitlin McHugh, 33, welcomed Billy in April 2018.

Caitlin in October 2017 announced they were engaged after a year of dating.

They got married in February 2018 just ahead of Billy's birth.

TV star: The 56-year-old actor, shown in April in Beverly Hills, California, and his actress wife Caitlin McHugh, 33, welcomed Billy in April 2018

John had a recurring role in the Netflix series You that debuted on the streaming service in December 2018 after it premiered on Lifetime in September 2018.

He will reprise his role as therapist Dr. Nicky for season two of You that will move to Netflix as a Netflix Original series.

John is best known for his starring role as Jesse Katsopolis on the ABC sitcom Full House from 1987 to 1995.

Family portrait: Caitlin, John and Billy are shown in May in Malibu, California

He also had a starring role on the NBC medical drama ER from 2005 to 2009.

John reprised his role as Jesse in the Netflix sequel series Fuller House that debuted in 2016.

Fuller House was renewed in January for a fifth and final season that will premiere later this year on Netflix.
description: The 56-year-old actor took to Instagram on Tuesday to share a selfie of himself with son Billy.
